story_text: Ricky the rabbit raced around the red rose garden.
His friend Rosie the raccoon watched him run in circles.
story_images: A gray rabbit with big ears is running fast around a garden filled with bright red roses.
A curious raccoon sitting on the grass, watching the rabbit as it runs in big circles around the garden.

questions.question: What kind of animal is Ricky?
What color roses are in the garden?
